EmailTemplate.name: LNW - Barnet Race for Life bootcamp
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you do NCS in Barnet? Volunteer at Tesco's pre-Race for Life bootcamp THIS SUNDAY!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}, if you're free this Sunday then Tesco need you!
Tesco and All Active Brent are running a brilliant pre-Race for Life bootcamp this Sunday and they'd love volunteers who've completed NCS in Barnet. That means you're invited!
Skills you will need:
Enthusiasm Initiative Interest in helping others keep fit
Details for the day:
10am to 4pm at Willesden Sports Centre You'll be helping to run a bootcamp for women and children who are interested in running Cancer Research's Race for Life Lots of different opportunities available - from running the registration desk to supporting with the bootcamp sessions, there's something for everyone!
How to get involved:
Send a text to Tesco's volunteer co-ordinator Marcie Thomas on 07944829508 State your name and what times you are free to volunteer Wait for her to call you back to confirm!
This opportunity is not organised by The Challenge Society - you'll be a volunteer with Tesco and All Active Brent. Please do not respond to this email to organise your volunteering, as we are not involved in the day.
Have a great weekend!
Kind regards,
The Challenge Society www.tcsnorthlondon.co.uk
